AT.name: Paper Mario™
AT.description: Mario mag zweidimensional sein, aber dieses Abenteuer ist alles andere als dünn! Paper Mario verbindet das Plattform-Treiben des heldenhaften Klempners elegant mit witzigem Rollenspiel voller ausgefallener Charaktere und verrückter Aufgaben. Beginne deine epische Reise durchs Pilzkönigreich, um die Hohen Sterne zu befreien, die der machtgierige Bowser gefangen hält. Unterwegs wirst du in unterhaltsamen, rundenbasierten Kämpfen Feinde bekämpfen, dich mit einzigartig begabten Partnern verbünden, geheime Minispiele entdecken und sogar einen Kuchen backen! Wenn du diesen Titel bereits auf deiner Wii™ erworben hast, führe einen System-Transfer von deiner Wii auf deine Wii U™ durch, um ein Upgrade-Sonderangebot zu erhalten. Dies ist die europäische Version des Spiels, die vom Entwickler ursprünglich optimiert wurde, um Musik mit ähnlicher Geschwindigkeit abzuspielen wie die US-Version. Das Spiel, die Demos und die Animationen laufen mit PAL-Geschwindigkeit ab. Das Bildformat wurde für diese Version korrigiert.

AU.name: Paper Mario™
AU.description: Mario may be two-dimensional but this adventure is anything but thin! Paper Mario brilliantly blends the heroic plumber's platform antics with a hilarious role-playing quest full of offbeat characters and wacky challenges. Embark on an epic journey through the Mushroom Kingdom to release the Star Spirits imprisoned by a power-hungry Bowser. Along the way you’ll fight enemies in entertaining turn-based battles, team up with a variety of uniquely skilled partners, discover secret minigames, and even bake a cake! If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the European version of the game, which was originally optimised by the developer to play music at a speed similar to the US version. Gameplay, demos and animations run at PAL speed. The aspect ratio has been corrected for this release.

BG.name: Paper Mario™
BG.description: Mario may be two-dimensional but this adventure is anything but thin! Paper Mario brilliantly blends the heroic plumber's platform antics with a hilarious role-playing quest full of offbeat characters and wacky challenges. This is the European version of the game, which was originally optimised by the developer to play music at a speed similar to the US version. Gameplay, demos and animations run at PAL speed. The aspect ratio has been corrected for this release.

BE.name: Paper Mario™
BE.description: Mario ne repose que sur 2 dimensions mais ses aventures ne sont pas plates pour autant ! Paper Mario mêle avec brio les facéties sur plateforme du brave plombier avec une quête de jeu de rôle hilarante tout en apportant un flot de personnages décalés et challenges barrés. Embarquez dans une aventure épique à travers le Royaume Champignon pour sauver les esprits des étoiles des griffes de l'insatiable Bowser. En chemin vous affronterez des ennemis dans des combats au tour par tour amusants, ferez équipe avec des partenaires uniques, découvrirez des mini-jeux secrets et ferez même un gâteau ! Si vous possédez ce titre sur votre Wii, faites un transfert Wii™ vers votre Wii U™ afin d'obtenir la version améliorée à un prix spécial ! Il s’agit ici de la version européenne du jeu. Elle a été originellement optimisée par le développeur pour que la musique ait la même vitesse que la version américaine. Le gameplay, les démos et les animations vont à la vitesse PAL. Le format de l’image a été corrigé pour cette sortie.

ES.name: Paper Mario™
ES.description: Puede que Mario sea bidimensional, pero su aventura no es para tomársela a la ligera. Paper Mario combina a la perfección el clásico de plataformas del heroico fontanero con una misión desternillante llena de personajes inusuales y desafíos disparatados. Embárcate en un viaje épico por el Reino Champiñón y libera a los Espíritus Estelares capturados por un Bowser hambriento de poder. Por el camino, te enfrentarás a enemigos en emocionantes combates por turnos, lucharás junto a compañeros con increíbles habilidades, descubrirás minijuegos secretos y hasta ¡cocinarás un pastel! Si posees este título en tu Wii™, puedes realizar una transferencia de datos de Wii a Wii U™ y obtener una actualización a un precio especial. Esta es la versión europea del juego, optimizada en su momento por el desarrollador para lograr que reprodujera la música a una velocidad similar a la de la versión estadounidense. El juego, las demos y las animaciones funcionan a la velocidad del sistema PAL. Además, se ha corregido el ratio de pantalla para este lanzamiento.

IT.name: Paper Mario™
IT.description: Mario sarà anche in 2D, ma quest'avventura è tutt'altro che sottile! Paper Mario fonde perfettamente il platform dell'eroico idraulico con divertentissime meccaniche da gioco di ruolo, personaggi eccentrici e sfide stravaganti. Intraprendi un viaggio epico nel Regno dei Funghi per liberare gli spiriti delle stelle imprigionati da un Bowser assetato di potere. Durante l'avventura combatterai nemici in impegnative battaglie a turni; collaborerai con una variegata scelta di abili compagni, scoprirai minigiochi segreti e cucinerai perfino una torta! Se possiedi questo titolo sulla tua console Wii™, effettua un trasferimento dati su Wii U™ per potere ottenere la versione ottimizzata a un prezzo speciale! <br/ Questa è la versione europea del gioco, originariamente ottimizzata dallo sviluppatore per offrire un'esperienza musicale simile a quella statunitense. Il gioco, le demo e le animazioni sono riprodotti in formato PAL. Il rapporto d'aspetto è stato adattato per questa pubblicazione.

The aspect ratio has been corrected for this release.

NL.name: Paper Mario™
NL.description: Mario is dan wel tweedimensionaal, maar dit avontuur is allesbehalve mager! Paper Mario combineert op briljante wijze de dwaasheden van de heldhaftige loodgieter met een hilarische RPG-missie bomvol onverschrokken personages en malle uitdagingen. Ga op een spannende reis door het Koninkrijk der Paddenstoelen om de Star Spirits, die gevangen worden gehouden door de machtsbeluste Bowser, te bevrijden. Onderweg vecht je tegen vijanden in vermakelijke, turn-based gevechten. Sluit je aan bij diverse partners die elk unieke talenten hebben, ontdek minispellen en bak zelfs een taart! Als je deze titel hebt gekocht op je Wii™, kom je in aanmerking voor een speciale upgrade-prijs als je je gegevens overzet van Wii naar Wii U™. Dit is de Europese versie van het spel. Het is oorspronkelijk geoptimaliseerd door de ontwikkelaar om de snelheid waarmee de muziek afspeelt zo dicht mogelijk bij de Amerikaanse versie te krijgen. Gameplay, demo's en animaties kunnen draaien op de PAL-snelheid. De beeldverhouding is aangepast voor deze uitgave.

NZ.name: Paper Mario™
NZ.description: Mario may be two-dimensional but this adventure is anything but thin! Paper Mario brilliantly blends the heroic plumber's platform antics with a hilarious role-playing quest full of offbeat characters and wacky challenges. Embark on an epic journey through the Mushroom Kingdom to release the Star Spirits imprisoned by a power-hungry Bowser. Along the way you’ll fight enemies in entertaining turn-based battles, team up with a variety of uniquely skilled partners, discover secret minigames, and even bake a cake! The aspect ratio has been corrected for this release.

PT.name: Paper Mario™
PT.description: O Mario está em duas dimensões, mas esta aventura é bem consistente! Paper Mario combina ação em plataformas com uma missão de RPG hilariante, cheia de personagens estranhas e desafios originais. Embarca numa jornada épica através do Reino Cogumelo para libertares os Star Spirits emprisionados pelo Bowser. Pelo caminho enfrentarás inimigos em fantásticas batalhas por turnos, farás equipa com parceiros com habilidades únicas, descobrirás minijogos secretos e irás até cozinhar um bolo! Caso já tenha adquirido este título para a sua Wii, faça uma transferência de dados da sua Wii™ para a sua Wii U™ com atualizações a um preço especial. Esta é a versão europeia do jogo, a qual foi otimizada originalmente pelo produtor de forma a proporcionar uma velocidade sonora semelhante à da versão dos EUA. A jogabilidade, as demos e as animações podem ser executadas a velocidade PAL. A resolução de imagem foi aperfeiçoada para este lançamento.

RU.name: Paper Mario™
RU.description: В этой игре Марио двухмерный, но приключения у него отнюдь не плоские. Paper Mario отлично сочетает в себе традиции платформера и веселое ролевое приключение с задорными персонажами и заданиями. Пуститесь в необыкновенное путешествие по Грибному королевству, чтобы освободить звезды, плененные властолюбивым Боузером. По пути вам предстоит сражаться с врагами в походовых боях, сотрудничать с интересными персонажами, находить скрытые мини-игры, и даже испечь пирог! Если вы приобрели игру на Wii™, вы можете передать ее на консоль Wii U™ и получить скидку на обновление игры до версии Wii U. Это европейская версия игры. В результате отладки, выполненной разработчиком, музыкальная дорожка в этой версии воспроизводится практически на той же скорости, что и в версии для США. Игровой процесс, демонстрационные ролики и анимация воспроизводятся на скорости PAL. Кроме того, был откорректирован формат изображения (отношение его высоты к ширине).

SE.description: Mario may be two-dimensional but this adventure is anything but thin! Along the way you’ll fight enemies in entertaining turn-based battles, team up with a variety of uniquely skilled partners, discover secret minigames, and even bake a cake! If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the European version of the game, which was originally optimised by the developer to play music at a speed similar to the US version. Gameplay, demos and animations run at PAL speed. The aspect ratio has been corrected for this release.

SK.name: Paper Mario™
SK.description: Mario may be two-dimensional but this adventure is anything but thin! Paper Mario brilliantly blends the heroic plumber's platform antics with a hilarious role-playing quest full of offbeat characters and wacky challenges. Embark on an epic journey through the Mushroom Kingdom to release the Star Spirits imprisoned by a power-hungry Bowser. Along the way you’ll fight enemies in entertaining turn-based battles, team up with a variety of uniquely skilled partners, discover secret minigames, and even bake a cake! If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the European version of the game, which was originally optimised by the developer to play music at a speed similar to the US version. Gameplay, demos and animations run at PAL speed. The aspect ratio has been corrected for this release.
